commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{% if section.settings.title != blank %} <{{ section.settings.title_tag }} style="color: {{ section.settings.title_color }}; font-weight: {{ section.settings.title_weight }}; text-align: {{ section.settings.title_alignment }};"> {{ section.settings.title }} {% endif %} {% if section.settings.text != blank %}
{{ section.settings.text }}
{% endif %}
{% for block in section.blocks %} {% if block.type == 'logo' %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
{% schema %} { "name": "Client Logos", "settings": [ { "type": "text", "id": "background_gradient", "label": "Background Gradient (CSS)", "info": "Example: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff7e5f, #feb47b)" }, { "type": "image_picker", "id": "background_image", "label": "Background Image" }, { "type": "color", "id": "background_color", "label": "Background Color" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_desktop", "label": "Hide on Desktop" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_tablet", "label": "Hide on Tablet" }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "hide_mobile", "label": "Hide on Mobile" }, { "type": "number", "id": "margin_top", "label": "Margin Top", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "margin_right", "label": "Margin Right", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "margin_bottom", "label": "Margin Bottom", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "margin_left", "label": "Margin Left", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "padding_top", "label": "Padding Top", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "padding_right", "label": "Padding Right", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "padding_bottom", "label": "Padding Bottom", "default": 0 }, { "type": "number", "id": "padding_left", "label": "Padding Left", "default": 0 }, { "type": "text", "id": "title", "label": "Title" }, { "type": "select", "id": "title_tag", "label": "Title Tag", "options": [ { "value": "h1", "label": "H1" }, { "value": "h2", "label": "H2" }, { "value": "h3", "label": "H3" }, { "value": "h4", "label": "H4" }, { "value": "h5", "label": "H5" }, { "value": "h6", "label": "H6" }, { "value": "p", "label": "Body" }, { "value": "em", "label": "Italic" } ] }, { "type": "color", "id": "title_color", "label": "Title Color" }, { "type": "select", "id": "title_weight", "label": "Title Weight", "options": [ { "value": "normal", "label": "Normal" }, { "value": "bold", "label": "Bold" }, { "value": "lighter", "label": "Light" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "title_alignment", "label": "Title Alignment", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "center", "label": "Center" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] }, { "type": "richtext", "id": "text", "label": "Text" }, { "type": "select", "id": "text_alignment", "label": "Text Alignment", "options": [ { "value": "left", "label": "Left" }, { "value": "center", "label": "Center" }, { "value": "right", "label": "Right" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "section_width", "label": "Section Width", "default": "standard", "options": [ { "value": "standard", "label": "50% Width" }, { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" } ] }, { "type": "select", "id": "section_content_width", "label": "Content Width", "default": "standard", "options": [ { "value": "standard", "label": "50% Width" }, { "value": "full", "label": "Full Width" } ] }, { "type": "text", "id": "custom_class", "label": "Custom CSS Class" }, { "type": "text", "id": "section_id", "label": "Section ID" }, { "type": "number", "id": "height_desktop", "label": "Height (Desktop)" }, { "type": "number", "id": "height_tablet", "label": "Height (Tablet)" }, { "type": "number", "id": "height_mobile", "label": "Height (Mobile)" } ], "blocks": [ { "type": "logo", "name": "Client Logo", "settings": [ { "type": "image_picker", "id": "logo", "label": "Logo Image" }, { "type": "range", "id": "logo_size", "label": "Logo Size (%)", "min": 10, "max": 100, "default": 50 }, { "type": "select", "id": "logo_ratio", "label": "Logo Ratio", "options": [ { "value": "square", "label": "Square" }, { "value": "landscape", "label": "Landscape" }, { "value": "portrait", "label": "Portrait" } ] }, { "type": "checkbox", "id": "lazy_load", "label": "Lazy Load" }, { "type": "select", "id": "hover_effect", "label": "Hover Effect", "options": [ { "value": "none", "label": "None" }, { "value": "zoom", "label": "Zoom" }, { "value": "grayscale", "label": "Grayscale" }, { "value": "fade", "label": "Fade" } ] } ] } ], "presets": [ { "name": "USP Accordion", "category": "Somos Custom" } ] } {% endschema %}
